description:
Wide avenues, outstandingly preserved historic houses, numerous green oases, and the mild climate are essential features of the spa town Wiesbaden. title: Our Campustour in Hamburg for you!
description:
Hamburg is one of the most attractive cities in Germany. A lot of green and even more blue characterize the city, due to the high tree population, the open spaces, and the water. These colors symbolize the high quality of life. The different quarters with their unique character and charm make it a great place to live and to go out. From the Schanzenviertel to the Kiez, there are many opportunities to meet fellow students and get to know each other better. Striking and worth seeing places like the Michel, the Nikolai Church, the city hall, the Elbphilharmonie, the harbor with Speicherstadt or the fish market are a refreshing break from studying. Take a walk around the Binnenalster or the Waterkant to relax and unwind from the daily grind.

Check out our website to get to know our study programs in Cologne: https://www.hs-fresenius.com/location/hamburg/?crmid=aEbQaAaDaAaAaDNaA
